item.title: Insert HTML Widgets in Blogdown
item.description: There were two main reasons for moving to blogdown. First, I needed a blogging platform that moved seemlessly between R code and its output. It had to be easy to show the connection between the code that was used and its effect on the data. Put the two side-by-side and people can understand what happened. Itâ€™s how I learn off the console.
